function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Restriction of access to public green spaces due to COVID-19 social distancing measures","Impact":"Reduced opportunities for physical exercise and exposure to nature, leading to potential mental and physical health issues for older adults","Mitigation":"Developing alternative methods for older adults to access green spaces or engage in outdoor activities","Technologies":"Virtual reality, online nature experiences, gardening kits","People":"Older adults","Owner":"Government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lockdown measures leading to decreased social interaction for older adults","Impact":"Increased feelings of loneliness and isolation, potentially impacting mental health","Mitigation":"Implementing safe social interaction programs or support networks for older adults","Technologies":"Online social platforms, video conferencing tools, community support apps","People":"Older adults","Owner":"Community organizations, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Limited assessment of the impact of domestic gardens on wellbeing during lockdown","Impact":"Lack of understanding of the potential benefits of domestic gardens for mental and physical health during the pandemic","Mitigation":"Conducting research to assess the specific contribution of domestic gardens to wellbeing and mental health","Technologies":"Data collection tools, surveys, remote monitoring technology","People":"Research institutions, public health agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
